item.title: Portfolio
item.description: I know, a developer portfolio is by far not as amusing as one of a graphics designer. Nevertheless I hope all the nerds beeing sent to this page can enjoy the ride through my personal technology timeline. Is’nt it amazing how fast all this stuff keeps changing and evolving? 2014 - now myPlant Backend, architecture and infrastructure for an industrial IoT/Analytics platform, consulting in areas of scalability, continuous integration and deployment, system integration (ERP, service, parts, …), authentication (SSO), public APIs, implemented REST/GraphQL API (micro) service layers with Scala and Akka for analytics and asset management, planning and configuration of a scaleable cluster setup, migration of existing legacy systems.

item.title: About
item.description: There is actually not much to say about me and my work, as life is a matter of constant change. What I am right now might have nothing to do with the person I will become a few days from now. Sounds philosophical? Maybe. The most constant thing about the work I am doing is that I am not (only) here for the money. I am here for the constant change and progess all tech stuff is making.
